name: AWS IoT Core
short: A managed cloud platform on AWS that lets connected devices easily and securely interact with cloud applications and other devices.
description: AWS IoT Core is a managed cloud service that lets connected devices interact with cloud applications and other devices. It supports billions of devices and trillions of messages, and can process and route those messages to AWS endpoints. Its features include secure device connectivity, data management, and real-time analytics. IoT Core also integrates with other AWS services, providing a full solution to build IoT applications. It enables secure, reliable communication between IoT devices and the cloud, facilitating IoT device management and data analysis.
